attributes.action: Reopen the Carl Bridgewater murder case
attributes.background: Due to a recent revealing TV documentary and the lack of a concrete alibi of any suspect in this case, it is in the public interest that this case is reopened for further investigation

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition because reopening the Carl Bridgewater case would be an operational decision for the local police force. This is not something for which the UK Government or Parliament is responsible.
